title: IDAHO BUILDING CODE ACT – Adds to existing law to provide for certain live virtual re-inspections and to provide for timely inspections and the option for third-party inspections in certain situations.
subject: BUILDINGS
CITIES
COUNTIES
INSPECTIONS AND INSPECTORS
